channel.title: Need Help!
channel.description:
1)Ok, I need help with item interface; like stats. i have all the stuff inmy client, but i dont kno where and what to put in serverside.
2)My dclaws, i have them in my server, i added 4-hit-spec, but only 2 hits like if i hit 15-10-5-23 only likes 33dmage goes to it 10+23) lol. any help?
3) Dclaws Again, the stat requirement, ive looked at other posts but it just hasnt helped me.

item.title: Need Help!
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

public void Dclaws() { if (IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == DclawID) { setAnimation(2068); actionTimer = 4; SpecDamgNPC(25); DC4Damg = 4; DDStimer = 1; resetAnimation(); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; SpecDamgNPC(35); SpecialDelay -= 1; sM("You strike with the power of Dragon Claws!"); } else if (IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == DclawID) { int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX; int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY; int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; SpecDamg(25); DC4Damg = 3; DDStimer = 1; startAnimation(2068); actionTimer = 4; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; SpecialDelay -= 1; sM("You strike with the power of Dragon Claws!"); }

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3098 && specialAmount >= 50) { // Dclaws startAnimation(2068); Dclaws(); specialDamage = 10 + misc.random(25); specialAmount -= 50; sM("You strike with the power of Dragon Claws!"); }

item.title: Need Help!
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

[quote=“0wn3r k4t3, post:1, topic:307201”]1)Ok, I need help with item interface; like stats. i have all the stuff inmy client, but i dont kno where and what to put in serverside.

2)My dclaws, i have them in my server, i added 4-hit-spec, but only 2 hits like if i hit 15-10-5-23 only likes 33dmage goes to it 10+23) lol.
any help?

  1. —[/quote]

Client.java.
Search “GetCLDef” or “GetCLAt”.
Those are the level requirements for Defence + Attack.
If you don’t notice this, look for the name “Dragon”.
This is why it says 60 defence for dragon claws. You can either:
Delete it and add each requirement for dragon items by IDs.
or
Add in another requirement for “Dragon Claw” and make it 1.
In the GetCLAtt, make req for Dragon Claws = 60, or whatever.

I don’t even understand the problem. You have 4-hit claws, but they hit 2 times even though you added them, and they hit 4 #'s, but only appear 2? Wtf? O_o

Read full topic
